name: best-random
description: A replacement for Math.random() that is tiny, fast, seedable, and has good statistical properties.

scripts.bench: npm run build && cd bench && ts-node index.ts
scripts.test:u32: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint32 0 | RNG_Test stdin32 -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.test:u53: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint53 0 | RNG_Test stdin -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.test:u53l: npm run build && cd tools && ts-node binout.ts best-random uint53lo 0 | RNG_Test stdin32 -seed 0 -tf 2 -te 1 -multithreaded
scripts.make:rng: cd tools/rng && make && npm run make:testu01:rng
scripts.waitforkey: echo "Press [Enter] key to exit..." && read unused > /dev/null
scripts.screen: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 33 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.screen:loop: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32h -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 33 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32hr -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32lr -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32l -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.screen2: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u32hr -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64 -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "npm run allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u32h -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u32l -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.practrand: npm run make:rng && tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run practrand:64b:u64 -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 66 -h 'sh -c "npm run practrand:128b:u64 -- -singlethreaded"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h 'sh -c "npm run practrand:u64"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.cycle: cd tools/cycle && tmux new-session 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 4"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 5"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 6"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 7"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 75 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 1"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 66 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 2"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "ts-node cycle.ts 0x80 3"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.allcrush:u32h: npm run smallcrush:u32h -- -x 5 && npm run testu01 -- -c -h && npm run testu01 -- -b -h -x
scripts.allcrush:u32hr: npm run smallcrush:u32hr -- -x 5 && npm run testu01 -- -c -h -r && npm run testu01 -- -b -h -r -x
scripts.allcrush:u32l: npm run smallcrush:u32l -- -x 5 && npm run testu01 -- -c -l && npm run testu01 -- -b -l -x
scripts.allcrush:u32lr: npm run smallcrush:u32lr -- -x 5 && npm run testu01 -- -c -l -r && npm run testu01 -- -b -l -r -x
scripts.allcrush:core: tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run --silent allcrush:u32h"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run --silent allcrush:u32hr"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent allcrush:u32lr"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run --silent allcrush:u32l"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.smallcrush:loop:core: tmux new-session 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32h -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -p 50 -v 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32hr -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32lr -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; select-pane -t 0 \; split-window -h -p 50 'sh -c "npm run smallcrush:u32l -- -x 0"; npm run waitforkey' \; attach
scripts.allcrush: npm run make:rng && npm run --silent allcrush:core
scripts.allcrush:pcg: npm run make:rng:pcg && npm run --silent allcrush:core
scripts.smallcrush:loop: npm run make:rng && npm run --silent smallcrush:loop:core
scripts.smallcrush:loop:pcg: npm run make:rng:pcg && npm run --silent smallcrush:loop:core

author: Daniel Lehenbauer
